title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
writer: Johnny Onda, Ai Orii, Yuuki Tabata
short_cast: Gakuto Kajiwara, Nobunaga Shimazaki, Junichi Suwabe, Kana Yuuki, Toshihiko Seki, Jun Fukuyama, Genki Muro, Ayumu Murase, Satoshi Hino, Nana Mizuki, Toshiyuki Morikawa, Hochu Otsuka, Miyuki Sawashiro, Fumiya Takahashi, Marie Iitoyo
cast: Gakuto Kajiwara, Nobunaga Shimazaki, Junichi Suwabe, Kana Yuuki, Toshihiko Seki, Jun Fukuyama, Genki Muro, Ayumu Murase, Satoshi Hino, Nana Mizuki, Toshiyuki Morikawa, Hochu Otsuka, Miyuki Sawashiro, Fumiya Takahashi, Marie Iitoyo

desc: As a lionhearted boy who can’t wield magic strives for the title of Wizard King, four banished Wizard Kings of yore return to crush the Clover Kingdom.
